Linear Regression in Python

This document provides an overview of linear regression, its importance in data science and machine learning, and how to implement it using Python. Linear regression is a fundamental statistical technique used for predicting continuous outcomes based on one or more predictor variables. It is widely used in various fields such as finance, healthcare, and social networks. The document covers different types of linear regression, including simple linear regression, multiple linear regression, polynomial regression, and advanced techniques like underfitting and overfitting. It also discusses how to implement linear regression using Python packages such as scikit-learn and statsmodels.

linear regression python machine learning data science polynomial regression underfitting overfitting LinearRegression scikit-learn multiple linear regression
